entry.title: Headbands
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: each
Price: 8.00

One size fits all.

 

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Nepali Coin Purse
entry.summary:
Vendor: New Sadle, Nepal
Type: each
Price: 5.00

Coin Purse

 

Traditional Nepali coin purse for coins or other treasures! Pull on like-coloured strings to open, the other 2 to close. 4" x 4"

Made in Nepal by New SADLE, Nepal. WFTO member, Fair Trade Group Nepal.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Global Crafts
Type: each
Price: 29.00

Sarongs

Beautiful women's sarongs, made with 100% rayon (a wood fibre) in Indonesia. 64" long x 46" wide. Also nice as a tablecloth, drapery, pillowcases or fabric for any other ideas.

So many ways to wear a sarong - here's a quick video 10 ways to wear a sarong

    Global Crafts, Indonesia

Global Crafts curates 2,000+ socially responsible products from artisan groups in over 20 countries. FTF member.

entry.title: Dancing Girl Earrings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Global Crafts
Type: each
Price: 8.95

These girls will "dance" all day from your ear! Handmade in Kenya with recycled pop cans and wire, and decorated with colourful beads. Literally hundreds of colour combinations - we will try to accommodate any specific request. Earrings approximately 2 1/2" high.

  Global Crafts, Kenya & US

Global Crafts curates 2,000+ socially responsible products from artisan groups in over 20 countries. FTF member.

Not sure what they'll like? Let them choose! When you purchase a Gift Card from us, you will receive an email that contains a unique gift card code that can be used at checkout to redeem its value.

entry.title: Finger Pin Cushion
entry.summary:
Vendor: UPAVIM, Guatemala
Type: each
Price: 3.95

If you sew, you know how handy it is to have your pins nearby. With this surprisingly comfortable finger pin cushion, you won’t even have to reach. Made from cotton scraps and a  upcycled plastic bottle cap. Handmade in Guatemala by UPAVIM Crafts.  

 

  UPAVIM, Guatemala

UPAVIM is a group of 65 marginalized women artisans living near Guatemala City. Fair Trade sales provide sustainable incomes, a medical and dental clinic, an elementary school and daycare, 625 school scholarships, and much more. FTF member.

entry.title: Eco Bracelet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Global Mamas, Ghana
Type: each
Price: 17.95

Eco Bracelet

Represents the interdependence of all facets of the earth: the earth, oceans, rainforests, atmosphere, wildlife, people, fair trade and peace. Designed by Susan Allen of the Brookfield Zoo in Chicago. Handmade recycled glass beads. Stretch band ~ 7.5", 18 cm. Handmade in Ghana by Global Mamas.

Bead making has been a thriving industry in West Africa since the sixteenth century and the Krobo area of Ghana is known as one of the beadmaking hubs. The handcrafting of beads using clay molds and ovens has changed little over the centuries as the family craft is passed down through the generations. In Krobo, beads are handmade from all kinds of recycled glass such as bottles, jars, and broken windows. Krobo beads are widely known for their vibrant colours and high level of craftsmanship.

      Global Mamas, GHANA

Global Mamas provides women in Ghana, West Africa the opportunity to improve their standard of living with dignity by promoting their traditional crafts. Proceeds go directly to the women participating in the Global Mamas Cooperative (all are paid over 10 times the minimum wage) and to support other non-profit programs. WFTO and FTF member.

entry.title: Totes
entry.summary:
Vendor: SERRV, Bangladesh
Type:
Price: 19.95

Bicycles back in stock! Smooth canvas tote is screenprinted with vintage bicycle and springtime flowers, elephant or tree of life in a traditional Indian motif. Gusseted sides and bottom. Reinforced straps are 23"l. 15"h x 14"w x 4 1/2"d

 

  SERRV, Bangladesh & US, FTF member.

ABOUT THE ARTISAN

Since 1981, SERRV International has partnered with artisans in Bangladesh, providing a long-term trading partnership and interest-free advance payment for our orders. Through sales of their products, these artisans also gain access to business training, awareness of women's rights, health and nutrition programs, and education for their children who would otherwise never attend school. Artisans are also able to improve their local environment, investing in deep wells for fresh drinking water, sanitary toilets in homes, and community reforestation through distribution of tree saplings.

Artisans in Bangladesh use many methods to create their variety of beautiful handcrafts, including basketry, terracotta, screen printing, and macramé.

entry.title: Zebra Crossing Sisal Handbag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Machakos Co-op Union, Kenya
Type: each
Price: 50.00

SISAL HANDBAG

This sturdy yet fashionable handbag goes with everything and is ready for action. Each piece is laboriously crafted from hand-twisted sisal in the traditional wakamba method of open weaving. The colouration is achieved wih natural dyes, using mango leaf, tree bark or plant roots. Over the shoulder leather handles are 28" long. Made in Kenya by MCU. 

  MACHAKOS CO-OP UNION, KENYA

Begun in 1987 to market handicraft products for its members locally and internationally, MCU now works with over 20 women self help groups and 6 handicraft co-operative societies within the marginalised areas, bringing together over 6000 individual members. Education to producer members and provision of social amenities are coordinated by MCU. MCU has embarked on an environmental conservation program to rehabilitate the forests. A tree nursery project was initiated to check on this balance. WFTO member.

entry.title: Pocket Wallet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Global Mamas, Ghana
Type: each
Price: 9.95

Pocket Wallet

Made from recycled hand-batiked cotton scraps, so each one is unique and made just for you! Three slots to hold many cards and paper money plus a slot to hold coins. Durable and lightweight. Velcro close. Machine washable. Handmade in Ghana by Global Mamas.

      Global Mamas, GHANA

Global Mamas provides women in Ghana, West Africa the opportunity to improve their standard of living with dignity by promoting their traditional crafts. Proceeds go directly to the women participating in the Global Mamas Cooperative (all are paid over 10 times the minimum wage) and to support other non-profit programs. WFTO and FTF member.

entry.title: Trashy Zip
entry.summary:
Vendor: Global Mamas, Ghana
Type: each
Price: 6.95

Trashy Zip

Trash to treasure! Made from 100% post-consumer, upcycled plastic water sachets, which once held drinking water in Ghana. In Ghana, water is sold in these plastic sachets and 270 tonnes of plastic waste is generated every day, the vast majority sachets for water and ice cream, and with no recycling program, much ends up littered on the streets. Each bag is carefully washed and disinfected before being sewn in a small workshop in Madina, Ghana.

Each is unique. Durable zip top. Handmade in Ghana by Global Mamas.

      Global Mamas, GHANA

Global Mamas provides women in Ghana, West Africa the opportunity to improve their standard of living with dignity by promoting their traditional crafts. Proceeds go directly to the women participating in the Global Mamas Cooperative (all are paid over 10 times the minimum wage) and to support other non-profit programs. WFTO and FTF member.

entry.title: Tree of Life Bracelet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Global Mamas, Ghana
Type: each
Price: 17.95

Tree of Life Bracelet

Each bead has a meaning: reach for the SKY remaining grounded by your ROOTS. If you lose LEAVES new ones will grow with the beauty and bounty of WISDOM. Mix of handmade recycled glass beads and bauxite. Stretch band ~ 7.5", 18 cm. Handmade in Ghana by Global Mamas.

Bead making has been a thriving industry in West Africa since the sixteenth century and the Krobo area of Ghana is known as one of the beadmaking hubs. The handcrafting of beads using clay molds and ovens has changed little over the centuries as the family craft is passed down through the generations. In Krobo, beads are handmade from all kinds of recycled glass such as bottles, jars, and broken windows. Krobo beads are widely known for their vibrant colours and high level of craftsmanship.

      Global Mamas, GHANA

Global Mamas provides women in Ghana, West Africa the opportunity to improve their standard of living with dignity by promoting their traditional crafts. Proceeds go directly to the women participating in the Global Mamas Cooperative (all are paid over 10 times the minimum wage) and to support other non-profit programs. WFTO and FTF member.

entry.title: Shoulder Bag from Nepal
entry.summary:
Vendor: KTE & New SADLE, Nepal
Type: each
Price: 7.00

  New SADLE, Nepal

This beautiful shoulder bag (over-the-shoulder strap, 2 pocket, zipper close, tassles with beads) is made by New SADLE, a certified fair trade group by WFTO (Fair Trade Group Nepal). 

Please specify colour and either satin or cotton fabric. Bag: 15cm w x 18 cm h, shoulder strap 160 cm long.

New SADLE (New Skill and Development Learning Experience) provides free medical treatment, food, housing, and education to ex-leprosy and ex-polio affected social outcasts in Kathmandu. Their employment and reintegration program promotes self respect and dignity. WFTO member (Fair Trade Group Nepal).
